game.name: Desktop Purrfect
game.shortDescription: Your purr-fect desktop companion is here! Get adorable cats that chill at the bottom of your screen, keeping you company while you work, study, play, or relax. Collect toys & furniture to build them a cozy home. Pet, feed, play, or simply enjoy their presence.
